amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to designate any nonbank financial company as "too big to fail" or as a "systemically important financial institution".
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 29 printed in House Report 114-639 to prohibit the use of funds to designate any nonbank financial company as "too big to fail" or as a "systemically important financial institution" or to make a determination that material financial distress at a nonbank financial company could pose a threat to U.S. financial stability.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garrett amendment (A023) Agreed to by recorded vote: 239 - 182 (Roll no. 381).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Garrett amendment (A023) Agreed to by recorded vote: 239 - 182 (Roll no. 381).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A023) offered by Mr. Garrett.
